descriptor

Class LabelGriddedDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • jmr.descriptor.MediaDescriptorAdapter<T>
      • jmr.descriptor.GriddedDescriptor
        • descriptor.LabelGriddedDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, jmr.descriptor.MediaDescriptor

    public class LabelGriddedDescriptor
extends jmr.descriptor.GriddedDescriptor
    Class which represents a list of label descriptors. They're not related to an image so they will be created by specifing the tags.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
